comment.author: 54995618@N05
comment._content: You tagged the pic "destroyed synagogue". It was not destroyed by the nazis because it is situated in a residential area backyard. So they vandalized the interior and left the building undestroyed. It is still in use and beautifully restored. Added tag "rykestrasse".

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Thank you for this correction!  It's nice to know that this building is still standing.  Is it now used as a synagogue again?

comment.author: 54995618@N05
comment._content: It is still in use as a synagogue. here is the link to the Jewish community of berlin with some information about the history and present activities. www.jg-berlin.org/en/judaism/synagogues/rykestrasse.html

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Thank you for the information. I actually placed it on the Leo Baeck Institute Facebook page. www.facebook.com/leobaeckinstitute
